/** Regex to identify the presence of a time zone specifier in a date string */
export const tzPattern = /(Z|[+-]\d{2}(?::?\d{2})?| UTC| [a-zA-Z]+\/[a-zA-Z_]+(?:\/[a-zA-Z_]+)?)$/;

sourcesContent:
/** Regex to identify the presence of a time zone specifier in a date string */
export const tzPattern = /(Z|[+-]\d{2}(?::?\d{2})?| UTC| [a-zA-Z]+\/[a-zA-Z_]+(?:\/[a-zA-Z_]+)?)$/;
